languages.text: "Его злодеяния на станции вы можете наблюдать и сами. Он возомнил себя свободным от обязательств пред наследием величайшего из {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Новаторов{/g} — Тисифоны Орселлио, что множество лет вела Дом к процветанию! Глупый малец... Отступники затуманили его разум. Они мечтают прибрать к рукам власть над династией, пока священное Дитя не успело окрепнуть душой и занять трон Новатора".

traits.locale_text: "Его злодеяния на станции вы можете наблюдать и сами. Он возомнил себя свободным от обязательств пред наследием величайшего из {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Новаторов{/g} — Тисифоны Орселлио, что множество лет вела Дом к процветанию! Глупый малец... Отступники затуманили его разум. Они мечтают прибрать к рукам власть над династией, пока священное Дитя, Леди Кассия, не успела окрепнуть душой и занять трон Новатора".

languages.text: "You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."
languages.original_text: "Его злодеяния на станции вы можете наблюдать и сами. Он возомнил себя свободным от обязательств пред наследием величайшего из {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Новаторов{/g} — Тисифоны Орселлио, что множество лет вела Дом к процветанию! Глупый малец... Отступники затуманили его разум. Они мечтают прибрать к рукам власть над династией, пока священное Дитя не успело окрепнуть душой и занять трон Новатора".

traits.locale_text: "You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."

"You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."

languages.text: “你可以亲眼看到他的恶行造成了怎样的后果。我们最伟大的{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}提西福涅·奥赛罗，她带领我们的家族迎来了无尽的繁荣！可那个愚蠢的小伙子……他自以为可以不受大族长遗产的约束。那些叛徒们蒙蔽了他的心灵，他们打算在圣子坐上大族长的宝座之前，将家族的权力夺到手中。”
languages.original_text: "You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."

traits.locale_text: “你可以亲眼看到他的恶行造成了怎样的后果。我们最伟大的{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}提西福涅·奥塞罗，她带领我们的家族迎来了无尽的繁荣！可那个愚蠢的小伙子……他自以为可以不受大族长遗产的约束。那些叛徒们蒙蔽了他的心灵，他们打算在圣子坐上大族长的宝座之前，将家族的权力夺到手中。”

languages.text: «Puede comprobar los frutos de sus fechorías personalmente. ¡Decidió que no estaba atado a sus obligaciones hacia el legado de la mayor de nuestros {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, que llevó a nuestra casa a la prosperidad durante innumerables años! Muchacho estúpido... Los renegados le abotargaron la mente. Pretendían hacerse con el control de la dinastía antes de que la niña sagrada alcanzara la mayoría de edad y se sentara en el trono de la Novator».
languages.original_text: "You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."

traits.locale_text: «Puede comprobar los frutos de sus fechorías personalmente. ¡Decidió que no estaba atado a sus obligaciones hacia el legado de la mayor de nuestros {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, que llevó a nuestra casa a la prosperidad durante innumerables años! Muchacho estúpido... Los renegados le abotargaron la mente. Pretendían hacerse con el control de la dinastía antes de que la niña sagrada alcanzara la mayoría de edad y se sentara en el trono de la Novator».

languages.text: 「彼の非道の結実は、自分の目で確かめられると良かろう。彼はオーセリオ家を何年にも渡って繁栄に導いた、最も偉大なる{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノヴァター{/g}、ティシフォン・オーセリオの遺産に縛られぬことを決断したのだ！愚かな少年だ…反逆は彼の心を曇らせた。聖なる『子ども』が成人し、ノヴァターの王位に就く前に、王朝の支配権を奪おうとしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の非道の結実は、自分の目で確かめられると良かろう。彼はオーセリオ家を何年にも渡って繁栄に導いた、最も偉大なる{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノヴァター{/g}、ティシフォン・オーセリオの遺産に縛られぬことを決断したのだ！愚かな少年だ…反逆は彼の心を曇らせた。聖なる『子ども』が成人し、ノヴァターの王位に就く前に、王朝の支配権を奪おうとしたのだ」

languages.text: "Ihr seht die Früchte seiner Schurkerei selbst. Er hat entschieden, dass er nicht länger an seine Pflicht gebunden ist. Seine Pflicht der größten unserer {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorinnen{/g} gegenüber, Tisiphone Orsellio, die unser Haus unzählige Jahre erfolgreich angeführt hat! Törichter Knabe ... Die Abtrünnigen haben seinen Verstand vernebelt. Sie wollten die Kontrolle über die Dynastie an sich reißen, ehe das heilige Kind erwachsen ist und als Novatorin auf dem Thron Platz nimmt."
languages.original_text: "You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seht die Früchte seiner Schurkerei selbst. Er hat entschieden, dass er nicht länger an seine Pflicht gebunden ist. Seine Pflicht der größten unserer {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorinnen{/g} gegenüber, Tisiphone Orsellio, die unser Haus unzählige Jahre erfolgreich angeführt hat! Törichter Knabe ... Die Abtrünnigen haben seinen Verstand vernebelt. Sie wollten die Kontrolle über die Dynastie an sich reißen, ehe das heilige Kind erwachsen ist und als Novatorin auf dem Thron Platz nimmt."

languages.text: « Vous pouvez constater par vous-même les fruits de son ignominie. Il a décidé de ne pas tenir compte de son devoir envers l'héritage de la plus grande de nos {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, qui a fait prospérer notre maison pendant tant d'années ! L'imbécile... Les renégats lui ont brouillé l'esprit. Ils ont cherché à prendre le contrôle de la dynastie avant que l'Enfant sacrée ne soit en âge de monter sur le trône de Novator. »
languages.original_text: "You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez constater par vous-même les fruits de son ignominie. Il a décidé de ne pas tenir compte de son devoir envers l'héritage de la plus grande de nos {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, qui a fait prospérer notre maison pendant tant d'années ! L'imbécile... Les renégats lui ont brouillé l'esprit. Ils ont cherché à prendre le contrôle de la dynastie avant que l'Enfant sacrée ne soit en âge de monter sur le trône de Novator. »

languages.text: "Yaptığı kötülüklerin sonuçlarını gör işte. Hanemizi sayısız yıllar boyunca yönetip refaha erdirmiş, en büyük {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisimiz{/g} olan Tisiphone Orsellio'nun mirasının gerektirdiği vazifeleri üstlenmek zorunda olmadığına karar verdi! Sersem çocuk. Diğer hainler, aklını bulandırdı. Kutsal Çocuk yetişkinliğe ulaşmadan hanedanlığın kontrolünü eline geçirmeye ve Rota Reisi'nin tahtına oturmaya çalıştılar."
languages.original_text: "You can see the fruits of his villainy for yourself. He decided he was not bound by his duties to the legacy of the greatest of our {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novators{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, who led our House to prosperity for countless years! Foolish boy... The renegades clouded his mind. They sought to seize control of the dynasty before the sacred Child had come of age and taken up the Novator's throne."

traits.locale_text: "Yaptığı kötülüklerin sonuçlarını gör işte. Hanemizi sayısız yıllar boyunca yönetip refaha erdirmiş, en büyük {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisimiz{/g} olan Tisiphone Orsellio'nun mirasının gerektirdiği vazifeleri üstlenmek zorunda olmadığına karar verdi! Sersem çocuk. Diğer hainler, aklını bulandırdı. Kutsal Çocuk yetişkinliğe ulaşmadan hanedanlığın kontrolünü eline geçirmeye ve Rota Reisi'nin tahtına oturmaya çalıştılar."
